references.paper_title: Deepseekmath: Pushing the limits of mathematical reasoning in open language models
references.reason: This paper is essential because it showcases the power of high-quality math pre-training datasets for solving math problems.
This paper showcases the latest advance on Llama models, which are later used as the evaluation baseline in this work.

references.paper_title: Measuring mathematical problem solving with the math dataset
references.reason: This paper is essential because it introduces the MATH dataset, a key benchmark used for evaluating mathematical problem-solving capabilities.

references.paper_title: Finemath: the finest collection of mathematical content
references.reason: This paper introduces the FineMath dataset, an existing math dataset that our MegaMath dataset aims to surpass in quality and quantity.

references.paper_title: Mathpile: A billion-token-scale pretraining corpus for math
references.reason: This paper introduces the MathPile dataset, another existing math dataset that our MegaMath dataset aims to improve upon.
